actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

actions.subcommittee: Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law

official_title: Referring the bill (H.R. 799), entitled "For the relief of Francisco Rivera and Alfonso Calderon", to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.

summary.text: Refers a specified private relief bill to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims with instructions for a report back to the House of Representatives.

titles.title: Referring the bill (H.R. 799), entitled "For the relief of Francisco Rivera and Alfonso Calderon", to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.
